radiographic_examinations.findings: Bibasilar dependent atelectasis noted. Clear lung bases, no pleural effusion. Liver normal with no focal lesions. Gallbladder mildly distended without edema. No stones. Appendix dilated up to 10 mm with hyperemic wall and periappendiceal fat stranding, fluid-filled. No evidence of rupture or abscess. Normal bowel caliber. 2.3 x 1.9 cm mesenteric soft tissue density lesion. Unremarkable pelvic organs. No free air or fluid in pelvis. No suspicious osseous lesions.
